name: Eastmar Estuary
economy_niches: estuarine fisheries, salting and preserved seafood
re-export of ritual reagents and imported goods
culture_adjustments: strong Riveric dialectal influence on Coastal Tongues
practical tolerance toward islander migrant communities
constraints: reliance on imported ritual reagents for local rites
navigational auguries supplement but do not replace pilots
notes: complex channel charts and local pilot licenses core to trade
seasonal mudflats restrict inland expansion; warehouses concentrated on higher ground
